tool_description: Retrieves policy documents and metadata from insurance database using policy number and claimant information.

policy_number.description: The insurance policy number to retrieve

error_messages: Policy not found: The policy number does not exist in the database. Verify the policy number is correct.
Access denied: Claimant name does not match policy holder records. Verify claimant identity and relationship to policy.
Invalid date format: Provide retrieval_date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Database connection error: Unable to connect to policy database. Retry after network issues are resolved.
usage: Provide policy_number, claimant_name, and retrieval_date to fetch policy documents. The tool returns policy content, metadata, and document status for further processing.

policy_content.description: The full text content of the policy document

policy_type.description: Type of insurance policy (auto, home, commercial, etc.)
